resources.string:
Democracy Droid! provides easy access to the Democracy Now Broadcast and Individual Story feed, the Live stream, and Downloads. Long-click on a broadcast to show its options.

Democracy Droid is not affiliated with Democracy Now! If you like the application, I encourage you to donate at 
https://democracynow.org.
This application is Free and Open Source Software.

Democracy Now! is a national, daily, independent, award-winning news program hosted by journalists Amy Goodman and Juan Gonzalez. Pioneering the largest public media collaboration in the U.S.

Democracy Now! is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-NoDerivs 3.0 United States License.

Democracy Now! streams live weekdays at 8 am
Democracy Now! streams live weekdays at 8 am\n\n

Fenimore Love | 2015 - 2016 GPLv3

File bugs by email or at the Issue Tracker at the Source Repository below.

I realize there is a pretty serious bug when streaming Video within the application. I only have one device to test this on, so any feedback here is greatly appreciated :).
Long Click An Episode to Download, Share, Read Description, and Stream. Long Click a Download to Open it in an External Player.
Long Click an Episode In order to Download it
Must restart app to take effect

I've recently become aware of a major bug when streaming Video within the app. As I am unable to fix it I've added an option settings: 

You can change the default Streaming-Video option. By default it will open the stream in this application, but if this crashes, you can change it to open externally (such as the browser). 

To watch it within the app, long click an episode and select the proper option. 

The refresh action is still in the menu, however now one can Refresh by Swiping Down on the broadcast list.
